extDescription.message: Enhanced page search with regex and DOM element selector support

popup_error_noKeyword.description: Error message when no keyword is entered

popup_error_noTab.message: Error: Failed to get tab information
popup_error_noTab.description: Error message when tab info cannot be retrieved

popup_error_specialPage.message: This extension cannot be used on this page

popup_error_connection.description: Error message when connection to page fails

popup_error_contentScriptInjection.description: Error message when content script injection fails

options_defaultRegex_desc.message: When checked, regex search will be enabled when opening the extension

options_defaultCaseSensitive.message: Enable case sensitive search by default
options_defaultCaseSensitive.description: Enable case sensitive search by default setting

options_defaultCaseSensitive_desc.message: When checked, case sensitive search will be enabled when opening the extension (disabled when element search or fuzzy search is enabled)
options_defaultCaseSensitive_desc.description: Description for default case sensitive setting

options_defaultFuzzy.description: Enable fuzzy search by default setting

options_defaultFuzzy_desc.message: When checked, fuzzy search will be enabled when opening the extension (disabled when element search is enabled)
options_defaultFuzzy_desc.description: Description for default fuzzy search setting

options_defaultElementSearch.description: Enable element search by default setting

options_defaultElementSearch_desc.message: Enable element search with CSS selectors or XPath by default
options_defaultElementSearch_desc.description: Description for default element search setting

options_defaultElementSearchMode.description: Default element search mode selection label

options_defaultElementSearchMode_desc.message: Select the search mode when element search is enabled by default
options_defaultElementSearchMode_desc.description: Description for default element search mode setting

options_mutualExclusionHelp_intro.message: Some search features cannot be used simultaneously. The following mutual exclusion rules apply:
options_mutualExclusionHelp_intro.description: Introduction text for mutual exclusion explanation

options_mutualExclusionHelp_elementSearc.message: When element search is enabled: Fuzzy search, case sensitivity, and regex search are automatically disabled
options_mutualExclusionHelp_elementSearc.description: Explanation of mutual exclusion when element search is enabled

options_mutualExclusionHelp_fuzzySearch.message: When fuzzy search is enabled (and element search is disabled): Case sensitivity and regex search are automatically disabled
options_mutualExclusionHelp_fuzzySearch.description: Explanation of mutual exclusion when fuzzy search is enabled

options_mutualExclusionHelp_note.message: When you change these settings, other settings will be automatically adjusted based on mutual exclusion rules.

options_fuzzySearchHelp_multiKeyword.message: Multiple keyword search: Matches when multiple keywords separated by spaces exist within a certain range
options_fuzzySearchHelp_multiKeyword.description: Description of fuzzy search multiple keyword search

options_fuzzySearchHelp_hiraganaKatakana.message: Hiragana-Katakana mutual matching: Searches without distinguishing between hiragana and katakana (e.g., treats あいう and アイウ as the same)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_hiraganaKatakana.description: Description of fuzzy search hiragana-katakana mutual matching

options_fuzzySearchHelp_caseInsensitive.message: Case-insensitive alphabet matching: Searches without distinguishing between uppercase and lowercase letters (e.g., treats ABC and abc as the same)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_caseInsensitive.description: Description of fuzzy search case-insensitive alphabet matching

options_fuzzySearchHelp_symbol.message: Symbol variation absorption: Absorbs differences between half-width and full-width symbols (e.g., treats -, ー, － as the same)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_symbol.description: Description of fuzzy search symbol variation absorption

options_fuzzySearchHelp_character.message: Character type variation absorption: Absorbs differences between half-width and full-width alphabets, numbers, and katakana (e.g., treats ABC and ＡＢＣ as the same)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_character.description: Description of fuzzy search character type variation absorption

options_fuzzySearchHelp_diacritic.message: Diacritic mark normalization: Treats separate diacritic marks (゛, ゜) as combined characters (e.g., treats か゛, ｶﾞ as が)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_diacritic.description: Description of fuzzy search diacritic mark normalization

options_fuzzySearchHelp_date.message: Date format variation absorption: Treats various date formats as the same (e.g., treats 2024/01/01, 2024-01-01, January 1, 2024 as the same)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_date.description: Description of fuzzy search date format variation absorption

options_fuzzySearchHelp_accentedChars.message: Accented character normalization: Normalizes special characters from non-English alphabets to English alphabet equivalents (e.g., ç → c, é → e, ñ → n)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_accentedChars.description: Description of fuzzy search accented character normalization

options_fuzzySearchHelp_substitutionSpel.message: Substitution spelling support: Supports substitution spellings for German and other languages (e.g., ß → ss, ä → ae, ö → oe, ü → ue, œ → oe)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_substitutionSpel.description: Description of fuzzy search substitution spelling support

options_fuzzySearchHelp_specialNumbers.message: Superscript, subscript, and circled number normalization: Treats superscript numbers (¹, ², ³, ⁰-⁹), subscript numbers (₀-₉), and circled numbers (①-⑳, ⓫-⓴, ⓵-⓿) as regular numbers (e.g., treats ¹, ₁, ① as 1)
options_fuzzySearchHelp_specialNumbers.description: Description of fuzzy search superscript, subscript, and circled number normalization

options_fuzzySearchHelp_note.message: Note: Fuzzy search is automatically disabled when element search mode is ON

options_fuzzySearchBaseMultiplier.description: Fuzzy search range multiplier setting label

options_fuzzySearchBaseMultiplier_desc.message: Set the multiplier for calculating the maximum distance between keywords in multi-keyword search. Range = total keyword length × multiplier (e.g., with multiplier 6, a 10-character keyword matches within a 60-character range)
options_fuzzySearchBaseMultiplier_desc.description: Description for fuzzy search range multiplier setting

options_fuzzySearchMinDistance.description: Fuzzy search minimum range setting label

options_fuzzySearchMinDistance_desc.message: Set the minimum distance between keywords in multi-keyword search. This minimum range is applied even for very short keywords
options_fuzzySearchMinDistance_desc.description: Description for fuzzy search minimum range setting

options_fuzzySearchMaxDistance.description: Fuzzy search maximum range setting label

options_fuzzySearchMaxDistance_desc.message: Set the maximum distance between keywords in multi-keyword search. Even for very long keywords, the range will not exceed this maximum
options_fuzzySearchMaxDistance_desc.description: Description for fuzzy search maximum range setting

options_contextLength_desc.message: Number of characters to display before and after matches in results list (10-100 characters)

options_dynamicContentOptions.description: Dynamic content search options section title

options_autoUpdateSearch_desc.message: Automatically search elements that are dynamically added or modified on the page (supports SPAs and infinite scroll). Note: Performance may be affected on pages with large amounts of data or frequent dynamic updates
options_autoUpdateSearch_desc.description: Description for auto update search setting

options_overrideCtrlF_desc.message: When checked, pressing Ctrl+F (Cmd+F on macOS) will open this extension's popup instead of Chrome's default find function
